name: Mood to Pop
description:
"Download now!

Tap two or more mood blocks of same mood to clean it.
Use some interesting props to help you clean mood blocks.
More mood blocks are cleaned,higher score you get.
The fewer mood blocks remaning after finish level,the higher reward points you get.

Features:
Excellent optimization!
Lovely mood blocks!You can share with your friends.
Easy to start with!You can play game with one finger.Suitable for all ages.
Exit anytime,continue anytime!No time limit!
Automatically save game progress.Don't worry about losing progress.

Enjoy the game and enjoy your life."
